name: Salperth (WIP!)
description:
PLAYTEST INFORMATION (Pls read!)  ----------------------------------

This is a stable-ish playtest version with some aspects of Salperth, an RPG I'm working on in Godot.

The current plan is for this to be a long-term project.

CONTROLS ----------------------------------------------------------------

Use the arrow keys to move.

Z - Interact, Select, etc.

X - Back

S - Inventory  (stable, but a little broken rn!)

IMPORTANT LORE INFORMATION -------------------------------------------

You play Mbalukkaa, an elf from the colonized nation of Cascassa, who has traveled to Salperth, the capital of the Thetch Empire to work as an Enforcer. 

You've landed in South Port.

CONTENT INFORMATION ----------------------------------------------
cw// racism

no sound.
